lead_id.description: The ID of the Lead the note will be attached to. This property is required unless one of (`deal_id/person_id/org_id`) is specified.

deal_id.description: The ID of the Deal the note will be attached to. This property is required unless one of (`lead_id/person_id/org_id`) is specified.

person_id.description: The ID of the Person this note will be attached to. This property is required unless one of (`deal_id/lead_id/org_id`) is specified.

org_id.description: The ID of the Organization this note will be attached to. This property is required unless one of (`deal_id/lead_id/person_id`) is specified.

content.description: Content of the note in HTML format. Subject to sanitization on the back-end.

user_id.description: ID of the user who will be marked as the author of this note. Only an admin can change the author.

add_time.description: Optional creation date & time of the Note in UTC. Can be set in the past or in the future. Requires admin user API token. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

pinned_to_lead_flag.description: If set, then results are filtered by note to lead pinning state (`lead_id` is also required)

pinned_to_deal_flag.description: If set, then results are filtered by note to deal pinning state (`deal_id` is also required).

pinned_to_organization_flag.description: If set, then results are filtered by note to organization pinning state (`org_id` is also required).

pinned_to_person_flag.description: If set, then results are filtered by note to person pinning state (`person_id` is also required).
